content: this is my newest design my faded diamonds scarf i ve writtren this pattern in uk terms with us terms written alongside in brackets there is also a chart pattern at the end for this pattern you will need any 4 ply yarn i used a scheepjes whirl in rhubarb bumble you will also need a 3mm crchet hook scissors and a sewing needle i would highly recommend blocking your scarf once finished it will help open up the design when i had finished my scarf it measured 100 inches by 10 inches at the end of the pattern i have also given the details of how to make a wrap version of this pattern this sale is for the pattern only this pattern is downloaded as a pdf you will receive a digital download after the purchase of the pattern any problems please message me at suzy@daisyboo net
